data.title: Delayed discharge: Must get out more often.
data.text:
TY - JOUR

T1 - Delayed discharge

T2 - Must get out more often.

AU - Lees, Liz

AU - Temple, Mark

AU - Capstick, Denise

AU - Maycock, Sarah

AU - Frost, Lynette

PY - 2004/8/12

Y1 - 2004/8/12

N2 - Delayed discharge fines increase pressure on trusts to prevent delays. The loss of vital information between health and social services undermines discharges' credibility. Pooled budgets between the two sectors are a powerful means of fostering innovation.

AB - Delayed discharge fines increase pressure on trusts to prevent delays. The loss of vital information between health and social services undermines discharges' credibility. Pooled budgets between the two sectors are a powerful means of fostering innovation.
